              Liang Fu付亮
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Welcome to my personal website!
            I am an Assistant Professor of Economics in the Department of Economics at International Business School Suzhou, Xi’an
            Jiaotong-Liverpool University. My main research fields
            are Monetary Economics and
            International Economics. My current
            research focuses on the transition of monetary policy in
            China.
            
            Curriculum Vitae
            Liang.Fu@xjtlu.edu.cn
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Liang Fu付亮
            
            
              
                
                                  
              
            
            
              Welcome to my personal website!
              I am an Assistant Professor of Economics in the Department of Economics at International Business School Suzhou,
              Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University.
              My main research fields are Monetary
              Economics and International
              Economics. My current research focuses on the
              transition of monetary policy in China.
              
              Curriculum Vitae
              Liang.Fu@xjtlu.edu.cn
